## redux-ajax package

Implementation of the `fetchText` and `writeText` callbacks.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [fetchTextAjax(apiBase, aLoggerService)](./redux-ajax.fetchtextajax.md) | Creates a callback function that loads content via HTTP GET from the API routes. |
|  [writeJsonAjax(apiBase, aLoggerService)](./redux-ajax.writejsonajax.md) | Creates a callback function that writes content to API routes via PUST, POST or delete |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./redux-ajax.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
